channel.title: How do i make party hats and stuff like that?
channel.description: can some 1 plz tell me how 2 make party hats and stuff

item.title: How do i make party hats and stuff like that?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

item = 1038 Red_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker.
item = 1039 Red_partyhat Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_Red_partyhat.
item = 1040 Yellow_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker.
item = 1041 Yellow_partyhat Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_Yellow_partyhat.
item = 1042 Blue_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker.
item = 1043 Blue_partyhat Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_Blue_partyhat.
item = 1044 Green_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker.
item = 1045 Green_partyhat Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_Green_partyhat.
item = 1046 Purple_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker.
item = 1047 Purple_partyhat Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_Purple_partyhat.
item = 1048 White_partyhat A_nice_hat_from_a_cracker.
item = 1049 White_partyhat Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_White_partyhat.

So all you enter is

::item (itemidhere)
